  • java.lang.Object

      • org.shortbrain.vaadin.container.AbstractBeanContainerFactory<IDTYPE,BEANTYPE>

    IDTYPE - The type of the item identifier
    BEANTYPE - The type of the Bean

extends BeanContainerFactory<IDTYPE,BEANTYPE>

                            Class<? extends com.vaadin.data.util.AbstractBeanContainer> beanContainerType,
                            String propertyId)
        Create an AbstractBeanContainerFactory.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - the type of the Bean.
        propertyReaderAlgorithm - the algorithm to be used to get properties.
        beanContainerType - the type of beanContainer to instantiate
        propertyId - the identifier of the property to use to find item identifiers.
